caption.p: Selected key areas to integrate into twenty-first century epidemic responses

tr.td: Local, national and international organizations; integrate accountability and transparency across multiple stakeholders; improve data sharing, improve logistics and crisis management
Encourage a community-led response, community engagement and health diplomacy
Anthropology, political science, human geography, linguistics
Pathogen genomics, metagenomics, systems serology and analytics, data science and artificial intelligence
Ecology and environmental, veterinary and agricultural sciences
